title: Metallurgy of Steel for Bladesmiths & Others who Heat Treat and
description:
Metallurgy of Steel for Bladesmiths & Others who Heat Treat and Forge Steel 

John D. Verhoeven 

Emeritus Professor 

Iowa State University 

March 2005 

Scanned PDF file.



Paperback: 201 pages
Language: English

Preface
For the past 15 years or so I have been working with practicing bladesmiths on
problems related to forging and heat treating steel blades. 

It has become apparent to me in that time that there is a need for a book that explains the metallurgy of steel for people
who heat treat and forge steels and have had no formal metallurgical education. 
This book is an effort to provide such a treatment.

I grant any user copyright permission to download and print a copy of this
book for personal use or any teacher to do the same for their students.
